p: The amino acid residues that contributed to the segregation of HA had certain flexibility; i.e., several choices were possible at the position. Therefore, PC for residues showed segregation into three directions in both cases, as even if a residue showed an extreme value in the PC for residues, the opposed residues would have diffused values. The three clusters did not run through the origin (Fig. S1B,D). If the changes were a choice between the two, opposite directions would yield a point-symmetrical shape (for example, Fig. S1E,F). Separations among types appeared mainly in PC1 and PC2, so the contributions were concentrated on these axes (Fig. S1G).
